page.title: 04Ravensworth Country Fayre
page.content: The{Fayre}is held on the last Saturday in June each year. It starts at twelve noon and goes on until 5 p.m. Newcastle Brown Ale Brass Band comes to play. There are competitions:- grass quoits, dog race and best pets. Some other attractions are - an amateur radio stand, Richmond Police crime prevention stand.{Mr.Bulmer}gave pony rides and Shire horses were used for cart rides. There were crafts demonstrated and items made for sale. These included toys,pottery,clothes,wood and walking stick carvings,candles and jewellery. The country games were:- guess the sheep weight,rat catch,wellie throw, tombola,bran tub,wheel of fortune and inflatable castle plus darts and dominoes The{W.I.}served teas in the village hall and everyone had a very good day.
